metadata.name: Dark purple - 1/1
metadata.description:
One of a kind.

Photomosaic & Streetart works combining photography and digital art. Emrod One assembles thousands of street photographies, representing Graffiti letters, from different artists, styles and eras that his path crossed and influenced him. The final work depicts an autonomous and singular image.

This token is bound to a physical artwork that will be shipped for free to the buyer. The dimensions of the work is 100x70cm including framework.

The artwork will be forever attached to this NFT. To ensure this agreement a contract must be signed between the buyer and the Gallery.

More information on https://www.vitruvius-gallery.art/

Dark purple is a unique collaboration between Emrod and the russian photograph Eugene Bravva. It was created in Bali during a full moon day, inspired by feminity and the dark shades of purple
